divs: Sighting DetailsThis event happened in 1977 I believe I was 12 years old at the time. It was the 3rd week of March or 2nd or 3rd week of April or maybe even into May. Between 4:05P.M. and 4:25 P.M.It was not cold out maybe 68-75 degrees, comfortable warm and sunny. I was just a kid flying my kite. In the distant horizon I saw what appeared to be a U.F.O. It was a dull red in color and twice the size of a airplane, it looked like Saturn a ball with a ring around it. It was traveling from North to South I was facing East. It was traveling 2 or 3 times as fast as a airplane. I was located about an 8th of a mile just East of Glen Ellen Road perpendicular to Armitage Avenue in Glendale Height, IL. I was in awe and speechless when I first laid my eyes upon it. I then turn to the girl I was flying my kite and said look do you see it, she looked but did not see it at first, then she was in awe and disbelief, I looked back to see it dissappear out of site. I then handed her my kite and ran up to were the Glendale Heights pool was at the time. I called the police. I was excited when I made the call, running up there to use the phone I thought they would not believe me and that I might be wasting my time or even riduculed. We did not have 911 then so I called the operator and asked for the Glendale Heights Police. I was connected right away. The lady dispatcher could tell I was upset. Instead of ridiculing me, her first question to me was what direction it it heading in. I told her North Avenue, she took me seriously and wanted to know what it looked like and I told her so. I dispacher could tell I was upset, after getting off the phone I went and got my kite nd ran home to tell the family what it is a saw. Please contact me with any questions. Did any one aroung my town see this as well? Just curious. Sure wish I had a copy of the tape so I could hear the police report Thank You Tim
Summary: Looked like Saturn, all same color dull red, a ball with a ring around it.
